info.description:
PEAK is an application kit, and applications are made from components.
PEAK provides you with a component architecture, component infrastructure,
and various general-purpose components and component frameworks for
building applications.  As with J2EE, the idea is to let you stop
reinventing architectural and infrastructure wheels, so you can put more
time into your actual application.
info.name: PEAK
info.html_description: PEAK is an application kit, and applications are made from components. PEAK provides you with a component architecture, component infrastructure, and various general-purpose components and component frameworks for building applications. As with J2EE, the idea is to let you stop reinventing architectural and infrastructure wheels, so you can put more time into your actual application.
